text: Francesca Lubiani (born 12 July 1977) is a former professional tennis player from Italy. Her career-high singles ranking is world No. 58, which she reached on 26 May 1997. On 15 August 2005, she peaked at No. 114 in the doubles rankings. ==WTA career finals== ===Doubles: 1 runner-up=== {|class=wikitable style=font-size:97% |- !Legend |- |align=center colspan=2
